AI Description: The r-xtable package in R provides an interface for exporting data frames or matrices to LaTeX and HTML tables. It allows users to easily create publication-quality tables for use in research papers, reports, or presentations.
Core Features:
1. Exporting data frames or matrices to LaTeX and HTML tables
2. Customizing table appearance and formatting
3. Support for adding captions and footnotes
4. Integration with R Markdown for seamless table generation
5. Compatibility with various LaTeX packages for advanced table features
